snippet: Don't exercise outdoors, keep the car windows closed, expert says.
abstract: Don't exercise outdoors, keep the car windows closed, expert says.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Arunachalam Gunasekar is a 30-year veteran of the Indian armed forces, where he was a public health professional and director of medical research. He joined the World Health Organization in 2008, where he currently specializes in environmental health issues including air pollution and associated health problems.

headline.main: A Conversation With: Air Pollution Expert Dr. Gunasekar
